backend/main.mo: Defines raffle, entry, user profile types and manages raffles, entries, Stripe config, and access control with various query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with related files, components, tests, and metadata for project evidence reporting.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend components, pages, and hooks for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode colors, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root mount element and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the router with theme support and global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Checks admin status and blocks non-admin users with an access denied message.
frontend/src/components/admin/RaffleForm: Form for creating or editing raffles with fields for pricing, timing, and optional video URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin UI for configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling auth state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to submit their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and shows a sign‑in prompt if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top‑level layout with header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing site credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with navigation, login button, and responsive mobile menu; shows admin links if applicable.
frontend/src/components/raffles/Countdow: Displays a live countdown to a target timestamp and shows 'Draw Time' when expired.
frontend/src/components/raffles/Purchase: Panel for authenticated users to select a quantity of raffle spots and start a checkout session.
frontend/src/components/raffles/RaffleAu: Shows completed‑raffle details including winner, metrics, draw date, and optional draw ID.
frontend/src/components/raffles/RaffleCa: Card view summarizing a raffle's price, prize, status, remaining spots, and draw time.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminRaffles: Provides mutations for creating, updating, changing status, and triggering draws for raffles, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useUserProfile.t: Contains queries and mutations for fetching, saving, and checking admin status of user profiles based on the caller’s identity.
Fetches all raffles and filters entries belonging to the current user, returning enriched entry data sorted by purchase time.
frontend/src/hooks/payments/useCreateChe: Creates a Stripe checkout session and records entry purchases, then invalidates related queries and redirects to the session URL.
frontend/src/hooks/payments/useStripeCon: Provides hooks to check, set, and query Stripe configuration and session status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/raffles/useCompletedR: Fetches all completed raffles from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/raffles/useLiveRaffle: Retrieves live raffle data including countdown and entries with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/raffles/useRaffles.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all raffles, active raffles, and a specific raffle by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/raffles/useRemainingS: Fetches and periodically refreshes remaining spot count for a raffle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, storage, and context handling for authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page providing access to payment setup and raffle management tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RaffleManagemen: Admin interface for creating, editing, updating status, and triggering draws for raffles, with dialogs and action handlers.
frontend/src/pages/LiveDrawingPage.tsx: Displays a live raffle drawing page with countdown, draw state, winner info, and optional video stream.
frontend/src/pages/MyEntriesPage.tsx: Displays the user's raffle entries, showing loading states, empty states, and entry details with status badges and winner highlighting.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment cancellation message with options to retry the purchase or browse raffles.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms a successful payment, checks Stripe session status, and provides navigation to raffle details or user entries.
frontend/src/pages/RaffleDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays full raffle details, including status, pricing, dates, and purchase/audit panels, with fallbacks for loading and missing raffles.
frontend/src/pages/RafflesPage.tsx: Lists all raffles grouped by status with tabs, showing a hero section and prompting new users to set up their profile.
frontend/src/router.tsx: Defines the application's route structure using TanStack Router, connecting all major pages including admin and payment routes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, requirements, and metadata for a raffle-style web application.
